report:
======================================================================
MATRYOSHKA (HIERARCHICAL NESTING) ANALYSIS
======================================================================

Like Russian nesting dolls, system architectures are often nested
hierarchically rather than linked peer-to-peer.

⚠️  IMPORTANT: Don't assume peer-to-peer relationships!
Architectures may be:
• At the same level (peers)
• At different levels (parent-child)
• Nested through intermediate levels
======================================================================

DETECTED HIERARCHY LEVELS
----------------------------------------------------------------------

SYSTEM Level:
  • Authentication Service (confidence: 90%)
  • API Gateway Service (confidence: 90%)
  • User Management Service (confidence: 90%)

======================================================================
HIERARCHICAL RELATIONSHIPS
======================================================================

Peer Relationships (same level):
  Authentication Service ↔ API Gateway Service
    Level: system
  Authentication Service ↔ User Management Service
    Level: system
  API Gateway Service ↔ User Management Service
    Level: system

======================================================================
HIERARCHICAL GAPS (Missing Levels)
======================================================================

⚠️  KNOWLEDGE GAPS: The following intermediate levels may exist
but are not yet documented:

1. Missing Parent
   Hypothesis: Unknown system_of_systems architecture that contains Authentication Service, API Gateway Service, User Management Service
   Missing Level: system_of_systems
   Evidence:
     • 3 peer architectures at system level
     • No common parent identified
     • Expected parent at system_of_systems level

2. Missing Parent
   Hypothesis: Unknown system_of_systems architecture that contains Authentication Service
   Missing Level: system_of_systems
   Evidence:
     • Authentication Service at system level
     • No parent architecture identified
     • Expected parent at system_of_systems level

======================================================================
RECOMMENDED NEXT STEPS
======================================================================
1. Verify hierarchy levels for each architecture
2. Investigate hierarchical gaps:
   • Document missing intermediate levels if they exist
   • Update architecture metadata if levels are incorrect
3. Consider hierarchical relationships when linking:
   • Peer-to-peer links: At same level
   • Parent-child links: Containment relationships
   • Indirect links: Through intermediate systems
4. Don't assume peer-to-peer - check hierarchy first!
